about_the_game:
Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #8


Unlock All Characters
This will unlock a gallery containing all of the character facial animations for your viewing pleasure. Enjoy!

Unlock All Voices
This will unlock all of the character voices in the game for your listening pleasure. Enjoy!

Unlock All Event Galleries
This will unlock all of the event scenes for your pure viewing satisfaction! Enjoy!
detailed_description:
Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #8


Unlock All Characters
This will unlock a gallery containing all of the character facial animations for your viewing pleasure. Enjoy!

Unlock All Voices
This will unlock all of the character voices in the game for your listening pleasure. Enjoy!

Unlock All Event Galleries
This will unlock all of the event scenes for your pure viewing satisfaction! Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.13GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 64Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 3GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card with 128Mb RAM and support for v3 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: Agarest 2 - DLC Bundle #8Unlock All Characters, Unlock All Voices, Unlock All Event Galleries
